sourcesContent: import Dimensions from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Dimensions";import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";var _Dimensions$get=Dimensions.get('window'),height=_Dimensions$get.height;var ANDROID_MINUS_HEIGHT=24;var DEFAULT_HEIGHT=Platform.OS==='android'?height-ANDROID_MINUS_HEIGHT:height;export var getHeightPercent=function getHeightPercent(percentage){return Math.round(DEFAULT_HEIGHT*(percentage/100));};
